options.command: concurrently --names "api,web,e2e" --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail --success command-e2e "nx run backend:serve" "npx wait-on --log --timeout 300000 --httpTimeout 10000 --interval 1000 tcp:localhost:3333 && nx run frontend:serve" "npx wait-on --log --timeout 300000 --httpTimeout 10000 --interval 1000 tcp:localhost:3333 http-get://localhost:4200 && API_HEALTH_TIMEOUT_MS=300000 nx run frontend-e2e:cypress --configuration=ci --skipServe --watch=false"
